member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: Provides additional methods for string manipulation

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Creates MD5 Hash of given string
member.param: String to generate MD5 Hash
member.returns: Hexadecimal string containing MD5 of the input

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if given string represents boolean value.
member.param: String to convert
member.returns: Boolean, representing if the given string is in the set of given true representing values

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.param: String to convert in short value
member.returns: The short value, represented in given string. If the conversion isn't successful the return value is 0 (default value of type short

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.param: String to convert in integer value
member.returns: The integer value, represented in given string. If the conversion isn't successful the return value is 0 (default value of type integer

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.param: String to convert in long value
member.returns: The long value, represented in given string. If the conversion isn't successful the return value is 0 (default value of type long

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.param: String to convert in DateTime value
member.returns: The DateTime value, represented in given string. If the conversion isn't successful the return value is DateTime.MinValue.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the first char of the given string to uppercase.
member.param: The string to capitalize first character
member.returns: New string in which the first character is converted to uppercase.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a substring between two substrings from given string.
member.param: The string in which the substring to be searched.
The substring which marks the begin of searched substring.
The substring which marks the end of searched substring.
The index of the string from which to search.
member.returns: Substring between the two given strings.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Converts cyrillic letters of given string to their latin representations.
member.param: The string to be converted

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Converts cyrillic letters of given string to their corresponding latin letter.
member.param: The string to be converted

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Converts given string to string containing valid username (including only latin characters, digits, "_" and ".", removing all other symbols.
member.param: String to be converted in valid username string.
member.returns: Converted string with invalid symbols removed.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Converts given string to string containing valid filename (including only latin characters, digits, "_", "." and "-", removing all other symbols.
member.param: String to be converted in valid filename string.
member.returns: Converted string with invalid symbols removed.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns substring of definite number characters at the begin of the given string.
member.param: String containing searched substring.
The length of returned substring.
member.returns: Substring of given number of characters at the begin of the given string. If given length is bigger of the length of the string, returns the given string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the file extension from given filename.
member.param: String containing filename.
member.returns: Extension part of the filename. If the given filename isn't valid filename, returns empty string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the file content type according given file extension.
member.param: The extension of a file for which content type to be returned.
member.returns: The content type of the file with the given extension.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts string to array of characters.
member.param: String to be converted.
member.returns: Array of bytes in which every two bytes represent one char.
